examples.example: 我喜欢在空闲的时候吃各种美味的零食。

translate.english: I like to eat all kinds of delicious snacks in my spare time.

examples.example: 我经常和朋友们分享美味的零食，一起享受快乐的时光。

translate.english: I often share delicious snacks with my friends and enjoy happy time together.

examples.example: 和家人一起分享美味的零食是一件非常幸福的事情。

translate.english: Sharing delicious snacks with family is a very happy thing.
